title: All Madden
description:
Bomani Jones shares his thoughts on Buccaneers WR Antonio Brown walking off the field in the middle of the game (1:45), as well as legendary coach and broadcaster John Madden passing away at the age of 85 (16:49). Plus, a fresh edition of #HesStillInTheLeague (27:56) and your voicemails from when you saw someone quit their job in the middle of a shift (34:37)!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Antonio Brown, John Madden, #hesstillintheleague and more!
